name: Mouse's Teatime
description:
Hello there! Here we have a tiny game for Trijam #156, in which the Mouse (that's you) wants to collect as much tea as they can, while avoiding the prowling cat, and preferably those blasted coffee cups too.

Controls are WASD or arrow keys for movement. Use your mouse to click the play button :)

The cat will come after you but doesn't move as fast. You can walk left and right off the sides of the screen but the cat can't.

Made using the Godot game engine and using:

  • GodotSfxr by tomeyro
  • Low Res Font by verythieflike
